description.title: Session keys: transact through a session key, deactivate and re-activate
description.purpose: The test creates a session key for a token/userid with a single registered account. The account transfers funds to the session key, then activates it, and then transacts using unsigned transactions for the session key. It then deactivates the session key and tries to transact, which should fail, then re-activates it and transacts again, which should pass. At the end of the test funds are returned to the account.
